# Video Marketing

## Quick Start

This skill helps you create effective marketing videos. For complete frameworks, see the [Complete Guide](references/guide.md).

## Execution Checklist

### Creating Marketing Videos

- [ ] Define video goal (awareness, education, conversion)
- [ ] Choose format (explainer, tutorial, testimonial, demo)
- [ ] Write script (hook in first 3 seconds)
- [ ] Record video (or outsource)
- [ ] Edit with subtitles (80%+ watch muted)
- [ ] Create thumbnail (high CTR design)
- [ ] Optimize title and description (SEO keywords)
- [ ] Upload to platforms (YouTube, LinkedIn, Instagram)
- [ ] Embed on website/blog
- [ ] Track metrics (views, watch time, CTR)

## Key Frameworks

- **Script Structure**: Hook (3 sec) → Problem → Solution → CTA
- **Video Length**: Social (60-90 sec), YouTube (8-12 min), Webinar (45-60 min)
- **Hook Formula**: Question, Bold statement, or Tease result
- **Thumbnail**: Human face + Emotion + Text overlay

## Quick Wins

- Add subtitles (increases watch time 40%)
- Hook in first 3 seconds (prevents scroll)
- Film vertically for social (Instagram, TikTok)
- Batch record 4-5 videos at once
